title: The Governance of Physical Artificial Intelligence. (arXiv:2304.02924v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Physical artificial intelligence can prove to be one of the most important challenges of the artificial intelligence. The governance of physical artificial intelligence would define its responsible intelligent application in the society.
context:
Title: The Governance of Physical Artificial Intelligence. (arXiv:2304.02924v1 [cs.AI])
Abstract: Physical artificial intelligence can prove to be one of the most important challenges of the artificial intelligence. The governance of physical artificial intelligence would define its responsible intelligent application in the society.
translated_abstract: 物理人工智能可能成为人工智能领域中最重要的挑战之一。物理人工智能的治理将定义它在社会中负责任的智能应用。
tldr: 物理人工智能的治理对其负责任的应用至关重要。
en_tdlr: Governance is crucial for responsible application of physical artificial intelligence, which poses one of the greatest challenges in the field.
